useCase.name: Update Session Details
useCase.description: Allows an authenticated user to update session details.

preconditions.precondition: User is authenticated and has access to the platform.

successEndConditions.condition: Session details are successfully updated in the database.

failureEndConditions.condition: Session details cannot be updated in the database.

mainSequence.step: Authentication system successfully authenticates the user.
User navigates to My Schedule on the User Dashboard.
User views the registered sessions on the User Dashboard.
User selects the Edit option for a session.
Session Management displays the session details form to the user.
User submits the updated session details.
Session Management validates and updates the session details in the database.
Database confirms the successful update of session details.
Session Management displays a success message to the user.
